notesStmt.note: This item is found at reel 1438:48, identified as Wing C6904, and at reel 1656:31, identified as Wing J1188 (both numbers cancelled in Wing 2nd ed., replaced by Wing C6902A).
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library (reel 1438:48) and Trinity College Library, Cambridge University (reel 1656:31).
